Class SettingsController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.tetris.controller.ui.SettingsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class SettingsController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the settings/music control screen. Manages volume sliders for music and sound effects.
